text.headline: first project as traffic and social media manager
text.text: In this role, I was responsible for managing the brand's Instagram and creating and managing advertising campaigns. This experience helped me enhance and build a foundation for my skills in the field.

text.headline: puhok
text.text: Once again, I managed all the company's traffic through campaigns and administered its social media.

text.headline: Portaria 1959
text.text: Just like in the other projects, I managed all the traffic and social media for the company.

text.headline: Participation in the Young Entrepreneur Challenge 1st phase
text.text: The Young Entrepreneur Challenge is a virtual game that simulates the day-to-day operations of a company diving into the universe of Creative Economy. The challenge involves conceptualizing a new animated short film that celebrates the company's cultural identity.

text.headline: Participation in the Young Entrepreneur Challenge 2nd phase
Winner of the Sebrae School Challenge
text.text: It is a business challenge where students from different years of high school will seek solutions to real company problems by applying business concepts learned in school.
